files.template:
export async function GET(){ const enc = new TextEncoder(); const stream = new ReadableStream({ start(c){ let i=0; const id=setInterval(()=>{ c.enqueue(enc.encode(JSON.stringify({ n: ++i })+'
')); if(i>=5){ clearInterval(id); c.close(); } }, 100); } }); return new Response(stream, { headers:{ 'content-type':'application/x-ndjson' } }); }
